content:
the main points discussed in the video as a starting point for the blog post.

* Expand on the main points by providing additional information and resources.
* Use the blog post to drive traffic to your website and promote your digital products or services.
* Use the email to summarize the main points of the video and blog post, and include a call to action to visit your website or purchase a product.

Turning already created content into Lead magnets:

* Identify the most popular and valuable content on your channel and website.
* Use this content to create lead magnets such as ebooks, webinars, or cheat sheets.
* Offer these lead magnets in exchange for email addresses, and use them to nurture leads and promote your digital products or services.

In terms of expert and uncommon advice, consider adding some of the following points to your strategy:

* Offer personalized skincare routine consultations and personalized digital skincare routine plans.
* Offer a skincare quiz on your website and use the results to recommend products and services.
* Collaborate with skincare professionals and experts in your niche to create exclusive digital products.
* Use AI-powered chatbots to provide personalized skincare recommendations on your website.

Please let me know if you have any further questions or need any more elaboration on the above steps.
